title: Stop Hurting Your Shoulders and Switch to These Backpacks
text:
Every item on this page was chosen by an ELLE editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy.
“On the fence? Don’t be. You need this. Just BUY IT.”
Everyone knows I love backpacks. It’s a moot point by now. I would stop talking about it if I could, but now I’ve turned myself into an expert, so if you’re wondering about the best backpacks for women, I’m your girl. 
For postural, sartorial, and practical reasons, a backpack is the way to go. Emphasis on postural. A leather tote is appealing, but a beautiful posture is hard to beat. Whether you plan to use it as a work bag, laptop bag, carry-on backpack or gym bag, there’s no limit to how you can make the most of a new option. 
I scouted out which backpacks on the market have both the style and function you need and also tapped my fellow editors for their personal recommendations to bring you this list of the 16 best backpacks for women. See them all below.
When shopping for a backpack, you often have to make a choice to go with a non-designer one that focuses on function or a fashionable one that might lack practicality. I love that Vivienne Westwood collaborated with bag brand Eastpak to bring you the best of both worlds.  
Colors: Planet Print 
Material: Recycled polyester 
Dimensions: Height: 15.35 inches; width: 14.57 inches; depth: 7.87 inches  
Lunch packers, I admire you deeply. Senior editor Alyssa Bailey recommends this style. “I walk to work and am regularly going to events for my job,” she says. “I needed a bag that could fit my laptop, a salad, and sometimes a change of shoes while looking fashionable. This one is it! Comfy, roomy but amazingly compact, Modern Picnic’s backpack has shown me I don’t have to give up style to have an actually good work backpack.”
Colors: Black, Cream, Black Croc 
Material: Vegan leather 
Dimensions: Height: 14.25 inches x width: 11.5 inches x depth: 6 inches
I know of at least three people at ELLE who use this bag—myself included. “Some bags seem to weigh even more than my laptop does, but this MZ Wallace backpack is feather light,” says Sara Austin, executive editor.  “I also appreciate the luggage sleeve that slips easily over my carry-on handle when I’m traveling.”
Colors: Black, Dahlia Camo, Dawn, Magnet, Silver Blue 
Materials: Sustainable textile, leather trim 
Dimensions: Height: 16.5 inches x width: 12.2 inches x depth: 6.9 inches
Whether you’re hitting Fright Night at Six Flags, Olivia Rodrigo’s GUTS tour, or you’re just into the transparent bag trend, this one’s for you. 
Colors: 8 options 
Material: PVC 
Dimensions: Height: 12 inches; width: 11 inches; depth: 6 inches 
Customer review: “Good bag. I bought it for a football game but ended up using it for work or running errands. Good size. Not too big or too small. I spilled mac and cheese it the other day and it wiped out super easy.”
“As a firm believer in backpacks for work, this Calpak bag is the one I get complimented on the most,” ELLE social media editor Carine Lavache tells me. “It’s chic, comes in a variety of colors, and has plenty of pockets to keep your things organized.”
Colors: 21 options 
Material: Faux leather, polyester 
Dimensions: Height: 15.5 inches x width: 11.5 inches x depth: 4.5 inches
A classic fail-safe. These packs last forever and seem to match any outfit, which makes them great for dressing up or down. 
Colors: 27 options 
Material: Vinylon 
Dimensions: Height: 14.5 inches; width: 10.25 inches; depth: inches 
Customer review: “I got this to use on our family vacation, and I was so happy I did. It is lightweight and fits all I need for a day on the go with my family. The only thing that I would change would be larger water bottle pockets.”
This bag is ultra functional and very affordable while maintaining a sleek, versatile style. It’s also available in a 17.3-inch size. 
Colors: 6 options
Material: N/A 
Dimensions: Height: 17.3 inches; width: 11.4 inches; depth: 6.1 inches 
Customer review: “I searched high and low, expensive and cheap and this bag is almost perfect!”
This backpack comes with a pacifier pouch, smell-proof bag for soiled clothes, a portable changing pad, AND a silicone teething ring. But even still, many reviewers say they don’t even use this as a diaper bag. It’s just an all-around good bag. 
Colors: Grey, Black, Navy 
Material: Nylon twill, vegan leather 
Dimensions: Height: 15 inches; width: 12 inches; depth: 7.7 inches 
Customer review: “On the fence? Don’t be. You need this. Just BUY IT....I truly do 100% recommend this!”
You can’t go wrong with Dagne Dover. Every item I’ve tried has been super high quality, and customers love that this backpack comes in various sizes.  
Colors: 6 options
Material: Neoprene, REPREVE 
Dimensions: Height: 13 inches; width: 9.5 inches; depth: 5 inches (for small size) 
Customer review: “Great backpack! Comfortable and has a lot of space and useful pockets/features. I use it for school, work, and traveling, and it’s great for all of these functions. It’s also stylish and really soft.”
The bottom of this backpack is a cooler, making it perfect for packing summit beers on your next hike or hard seltzers on your next trip to the beach. Or, you know, your packed lunch on a daily basis. 
Colors: Grey, Brown, Black 
Material: Polyester 
Dimensions: Height: 17.8 inches; width: 12.5 inches; depth: 8 inches 
Customer review: “When I received it, I liked it so much I had to get one for my husband as well! The insulated bottom is huge! My husband packs two one-liter water bottles, snacks, his lunch and an energy drink/pop daily. The top backpack part is a little smaller since it has the cooler on the bottom, but still holds so much. The bag is incredibly durable and lightweight also.”
If you don’t need a high capacity bag that can house your laptop and other bulky items, this smaller sling is a great style. 
Colors: Black 
Material: Leather, cotton 
Dimensions: N/A
Customer review: “Love the size! Strap is adjustable which is great since I’m short:) Beautiful leather too! A definite must have!”
I did not expect to want to purchase (yet another) backpack while researching for this story, but here I am. 
Colors: Brown 
Material: Polyurethane, polyester 
Dimensions: Height: 11 inches; width: 9.8 inches; depth: 8.3 inches 
Personally, my mom’s hand-me-down leather bags are some of my favorite—and highest quality—possessions. This option will age like fine wine. 
Colors: English Saddle 
Material: Leather 
Dimensions: Height: 15.5 inches; width: 11.4 inches; depth: 4.75 inches 
Customer review: “The sizing and style is perfect. Simple yet extremely spacious. I use it for work, school, and everything in between. It houses my 13 in. MacBook along with other books, hydroflask, and misc. items perfectly. Price is quite hefty but you really get what you're paying for.”
This little brown number reminds me of something Aunt Becky from Full House would wear. And I’m into that. 
Colors: Cocoa
Material: Faux leather 
Dimensions: Height: 10 inches; width: 9.5 inches; depth: 4.5 inches 
Can you ever go wrong with Prada? Simply put, no. The external pockets on this are a total bonus. 
Colors: Black, Light Blue, Desert Beige 
Material: Nylon
Dimensions: Height: 11 inches; width: 9.2 inches; depth: 4.7 inches 
As someone who tends to carry a collapsible reusable shopping bag, I’m very interested in getting one of these for myself. This option is so ideal for hiking, traveling, shopping—the list goes on.  
Colors: Teal, Navy, Black 
Material: Recycled nylon 
Dimensions: Height: 18.1 inches; width: 11 inches; depth: 5.9 inches 
Customer review: “Really convenient, especially when traveling in case you return with additional souvenirs!”
Meg is the Associate Fashion Commerce Editor at ELLE.com where she researches trends, tests products, and looks for answers to all your burning questions. She also co-writes a monthly column, Same Same But Different. Meg has previously written for Cosmopolitan and Town & Country. Her passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and sustainability. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.

title: These 22 Designer Tote Bags Do It All With Style to Spare
text:
Every item on this page was chosen by an ELLE editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy.
The results are in: You deserve to treat yourself. 
Here at ELLE, we believe in tote bags—of any variety, really, but especially in designer tote bags. As modern-day working girlbosses women, we can only do it all and have it all if we quite literally “have it all” on hand. Any bag I purchase needs to serve as my work bag, gym, lunch, diaper, and shopping bag simultaneously. Translation: It has to have space. Totes are great for this, and to prove my point, I spoke with Blake Geffen, CEO and co-founder of Vivrelle, a designer bag rental service, to get a non-partisan take on which totes are really all that. 
An avid tote user herself (she’s a mother of three),  Geffen confirms that a designer tote is a great investment option for anyone looking to start—or expand—a high-end collection. As for what to look for in a tote, durability is definitely key. “Both designer and non-designer bags should always be judged by the quality–from fabrics and construction to the stitching and zippers, buckles, etc.,” she says. “Our tote bags are constantly in motion, so it’s important that the one you’re using can endure your day-to-day comings and goings.” 
You should also take lifestyle and occasion into consideration. Are you more into canvas totes or leather ones? “Compartments and zipper pockets are also qualities I’m always looking for, though may be less important to others. Depending on the setting, shoppers may also want to consider fabrics and strap styles...While the trend cycle shifts quickly, nothing is more fashionable than owning your own unique sense of style. So, choosing a handbag that’s true to you is by far the most important factor when looking for your next bag!”
I took Geffen’s expertise, fellow ELLE editor recommendations, size, style, and features into account to bring you a list of the 22 best designer tote bags to shop now. 
The gold chain isn’t just for aesthetics—it adjusts to make the strap however long as you’d like. And the ultra squishy handle is like a built-in stress ball.  
Colors: 6 options
Material: Lambskin 
Dimensions: Height: 9.4 inches; width: 11.4 inches; depth: 4.1 inches 
ELLE readers love this Bottega Veneta Andiamo. Any bag that has been spotted on the likes of Michelle Yeoh, RM of BTS, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, and Jacob Elordi is an automatic thumbs up from me. 
Colors: 7 options 
Material: Lambskin
Dimensions: Height: 7.9 inches; width: 9.8 inches; depth: 3.9 inches
“I like to consider the medium Telfar Shopping Tote my ludicrously capacious bag,” says beauty commerce editor Nerisha Penrose. “The beauty (and versatility) of Telfar’s popular Shopping Tote is that it can be whatever the hell you want it to be...It houses all 12 of my nude lip glosses, my Macbook, a Tupperware packed with a home-cooked meal, and a collection of ketchup packets (who loves dry fries, anyway?).”
Colors: 40 options 
Material: Polyurethane, polyester  
Dimensions: Height: 11.25 inches; width: 15 inches; depth: 5 inches
This next recommendation comes from ELLE’s own digital deputy editor Claire Stern. “This perfectly sized carryall by one of my favorite Scandi brands, Little Liffner, has fast become my new go-to. It’s sleek and minimalist enough for after-work commitments and perfectly practical for daytime.”
Colors: 7 options 
Material: Cow suede, cotton 
Dimensions: Height: 7.8 inches; width: 7 inches; depth: 7 inches
What’s better than one iconic Tory Burch bag? A doubled version. 
Colors: Pine Bark 
Material: Leather, suede, cotton 
Dimensions: Height: 11.8 inches; width: 12.4 inches; depth: 6.1 inches
Like the love child of your favorite tote and your favorite vase. There’s certainly something to be said about self-supporting bags. 
Colors: Mushroom or Black 
Material: Cow leather, Polyurethane
Dimensions: Height: 23.5 inches; width: 16.3 inches; depth: 7.4 inches
Get ready to see big bows—a lot of them. I predict they’ll be popping up on designer clothes and accessories everywhere next season.
Colors: Boss Suede, Black Leather, Ecru Suede, or Light Denim 
Material: Calf leather (varies by style) 
Dimensions: Height: 29 inches; width: 17 inches; depth: 6 inches
Old Celines will never go out of style. I borrowed one to use during fashion month and was amazed at how spacious and practical it was. Would recommend. 
Colors: Neutral 
Material: Cowhide leather 
Dimensions: Height: 13 inches; width: 12.25 inches; depth: 6.75 inches
This otherwise standard black tote is spiced up a bit by the oversized gold buckle on the strap. 
Colors: Black 
Material: Leather, faux suede 
Dimensions: Height: 13 inches; width: 11.75 inches; depth: 5.25 inches
Doesn’t this A.L.C. bag look pillowy soft? 
Colors: Burnt Umber 
Material: Faux leather 
Dimensions: Height: 15.75 inches; width: 15.75 inches; depth: 4.75 inches
What? I’ve got nothing to hide. Flaunt your belongings in a sexy mesh bag. 
Colors: Black 
Material: Mesh, patent leather 
Dimensions: Height: 21.5 inches; width: 14 inches
Slouchy bags, embellishments, and metallics are three trends that I saw a ton of this fashion month. 
Colors: 6 options 
Material: Calf leather, silver plated brass (varies by style) 
Dimensions: Height: 20 inches; width: 20.5 inches; depth: 13 inches
It’s always nice when totes have multiple handles or adjustable straps. Rock this one on your shoulder, the crook of your elbow, or in your hand. 
Colors: Salmon Pink 
Material: Faux leather, twill 
Dimensions: Height: 13 inches; width: 18 inches; depth: 6.25 inches
Quilted bags are having a moment, and I can’t stop thinking about this Prada rendition, which comes in various sizes.  
Colors: Black 
Material: Leather 
Dimensions: Height: 10.6 inches; width: 12.2 inches; depth: 5.1 inches
Geffen cites the Neverfull as one of the most popular designer tote styles at Vivrelle. With a name like Neverfull, it’s no surprise.  
Colors: Brown Monogram
Material: Cowhide leather 
Dimensions: Height: 11.4 inches; width: 12.6 inches; depth: 6.7 inches
This is yet another customer favorite. Whether you actually fill it with books is up to you, but it is in the name.... 
Colors: Ecru and Pink Toile de Jouy Embroidery 
Dimensions: Height: 11 inches; width: 14 inches; depth: 6.5 inches 
Both Geffen and Stern love this bag from Saint Laurent. “It may not be great for my back, but this tote bag holds my MacBook Air perfectly and has a pouch for miscellaneous belongings (keys, phone, AirPods),” Stern says. 
Colors: Black 
Material: Leather 
Dimensions: Height: 16 inches; width: 13 inches; depth: 5 inches  
Swap your tired old work bag for this party-ready option from Rabanne that looks straight out of Studio 54 (or the Renaissance tour). 
Color: Silver 
Material: Mesh aluminum, leather 
Dimensions: Height: 39 inches; width: 34 inches; depth: 2 inches 
From the front, this might look like your average tote. But from the side, it’s got room in spades. If you’re looking for a wearable storage unit, this is the one for you. 
Colors: Black, Mushroom, or Burgundy 
Material: Leather 
Dimensions: Height: 15 inches; width: 21 inches; depth: 9 inches 
This is 2023’s high fashion version of a Mary Poppins bag. 
Colors: Brown 
Material: Leather 
Dimensions: Height: 14.6 inches; width: 22 inches; depth: 5.9 inches 
Meg is the Associate Fashion Commerce Editor at ELLE.com where she researches trends, tests products, and looks for answers to all your burning questions. She also co-writes a monthly column, Same Same But Different. Meg has previously written for Cosmopolitan and Town & Country. Her passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and sustainability. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.

title: 15 Comfortable, Office-Appropriate Pants to Get You Through the Workday
text:
Every item on this page was chosen by an ELLE editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy.
Because being comfortable and cute at work is a must.
Now that going into the office is officially normal (for most), it’s only fair that your work attire is equally comfortable and stylish. We just spent three years wearing pajamas 24/7, and, speaking for myself, I have become quite accustomed to the comfy lifestyle. Dressing for the office has been a struggle for me lately. Sometimes denim just rides up too high, and I’m constantly too cold in dresses or skirts. Although we’ve gotten used to the dress-down format, dressing up doesn’t  have to be super complicated. From the best dress shoes to ELLE editors’s go-to laptop bags, we’ve got all the help you need to commute to the office in style. Worry about your spreadsheets and scheduling, and leave the fashion bit to us.
Here, find 15 of the most comfortable work pants to shop now.
These straight-leg pants are affordable and extremely cool. The side pockets make it a standout. And trust me, they are super comfortable.
Sizes: 00-14 
Colors: Lead Gray Melange 
Material: Recycled polyester, polyester, spandex
Customer review: “Love the straight-leg look on these pants, and the color is to die for! Perfect for the fall season! Definitely a true-to-size pant.”  
These pants epitomize elevated comfort. The material is ultra-soft and can be worn for nights out, too.
Sizes: 0-10 Colors: Black Material: Polyester, viscose, elastane
This classic wide-leg is ideal for work, while the drawstring waist makes it extra comfortable. I’m personally obsessed with these. 
Sizes: XXS-3XL 
Colors: Medium Heather Grey, Beige 
Material: Polyester, viscose, elastane
Although labeled as “jeans,” these stretchy flares are wearable and comfortable. The elasticity makes them easy to slip on, and the white makes for a subtle yet standout look—especially in the winter.
Sizes: 0-8 Colors: White Material: Cotton, polyester, elastane
These trousers are for the girl on the go. Spandex has made a big impression in the workwear industry, known for its stretch, comfort, and durability. 
Sizes: XS-3XL
Colors: Classic Black, Chianti, Charcoal Heather, Classic Navy, Navy/Grey Pinstripe 
Material: Rayon, nylon, elastane
Customer review: “Wearing them on a long haul flight. Not only are they dressy but very comfortable! I love them!! I will need additional in other colors. A must-have!” 
The turnover waistband on these is EVERYTHING. It’s like two pants in one. They’re classic and effortless with the waistband up, yet relaxed and edgy with it flipped down. 
Sizes: XXS-L 
Colors: Macadamia, Dark Cactus 
Material: Twill 
Customer review: “Fit nice and very cute. True to size.”
These simple pants can be thrown into the wash for a quick turnaround even on your busiest week.
Sizes: S-XL
Colors: Navy Blue, Dried Moss Green, Black 
Material: Recycled polyester
Customer review: “I wasn’t sure what to expect from these pants, but I love them. The material is amazing. Super comfortable, doesn’t wrinkle, and lays nicely. Love them.” 
No steaming necessary here. These pleated pants are ideal as they won’t wrinkle and will keep their shape even after those loooong meetings.
Sizes: XS-LColors: Navy, Green, Black/White/PrintedMaterial: Recycled polyester
Everyone needs lightweight linen pants. It’s the perfect transition piece for chillier temperatures and makes any outfit a little cooler. 
Sizes: 0-14
Colors: New Black, Pebble 
Material: Linen
Customer review: “These linen pants are the best. I have them in three colors. So comfortable and lightweight. I took them to the east, where it is incredibly muggy and felt really comfortable in these pants. I love that they are not high waisted.” 
If you are going to splurge, do it on these. The silhouette drapes perfectly, and the belt detailing is beyond cool. Need I say more?
Sizes: 36-52Colors: Anthracite GrayMaterial: 100% Wool
Who said leather pants can’t be comfortable? The Melina pants are a viral sensation known for various length options and size inclusivity. They’re a total favorite among ELLE editors (myself included). 
Sizes: 00-16Colors: 9 optionsMaterial: Vegan leather Customer Review: “The pants fit true to size and really soft and comfortable. I would recommend it!”
This wide-leg trouser, featuring a  front pleat, is a closet staple that’s easy to dress up or down. These are perfect for every and any occasion. 
Sizes: XXS-XXL 
Colors: Natural, Gray, Black, Beige, Olive 
Material: Polyester, rayon, spandex 
Customer review: “These Wide-Fit Pleated Pants are an absolute style win for me. The relaxed fit and pleated design combine comfort and sophistication, making them my top choice for both casual and dressier occasions.” 
Calling all the Amazon girlies who need a closet refresh with next-day delivery. These yoga dress pants are amazing. The rich chocolate brown color is very fall, and I can think of a ton of ways to style these. 
Sizes: XS-3XL
Colors: 13 options
Material: Polyester, spandex
The flared silhouette on these is timeless, elegant, and fun. Style tip: Translate Princess Diana’s famous biker short outfit with these pants, cool sneakers, and a comfy crew neck for cooler temperatures. 
Sizes: XXS-XL 
Colors: Black, Toasted Coconut, Heritage Blue 
Material: Organic Cotton, modal, elastane
Loose trousers are all the hype right now. These manage to look baggy and tailored simultaneously. I imagine these making the day-to-night transition very easy.
Sizes: 0-18 
Colors: Beige, Black, Ivory, Navy Pinstripe 
Material: Polyester, rayon, elastane 
Customer Review: “This pant is one of the best pieces I’ve owned in a long time. Classic tailoring. Substantial materials. The perfect color will go with everything.” 
Isabelle Adler is a contributor at ELLE.com. When not writing about all things fashion, she can be found at a sample sale or sipping a Hendricks EXTRA dirty martini.
